body.description: About Dear Klairs Simple but enough The condition of your skin will always change depending on the weather and the body's condition. Protect your skin with Klairs' simple lineup that provides everything from cleansing and moisture to calming and soothing. Basic but ultimate We take the time, no matter how long, to create the best simple products. Klairs is effective even without the addition of special, unique ingredients. Just by using our products every day, your skin will slowly get healthier. Mild but powerful Since 2009, we ate Klairs have been researching different ingredients and raw materials for the best skincare for sensitive skin. Out products not only improve the skin's elasticity, but also quickly soothes irritated skin for ultimately healthier and stronger skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The hypoallergenic face wash for your sensitive skin ! The proper skincare starts from the right hypoallergenic face wash cleanser. If you have skin trouble or sensitive skin issue, start treating the problem by changing the cleanser. By using amino acid cleansing formula which is the main component of protein, instead of using chemical detergent(Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, SLS), it keeps your skin moisturized while cleansing your pores. This hypoallergenic face contains hyaluronic acid, ceramide 3 and olive oil to maximize hydration. Low irritant amino acid cleanser will start changing your skin texture from the beginning ! [Features] Acid balanced cleanser will keep your skin moist level after the facial wash. This hypoallergenic face wash contains low irritant exfoliating ingredient for sensitive skin so that you can feel smooth skin texture afterwards. 1) Free from artificial ingredientsNo Alcohol, No animal testing, No paraben, No artificial pigment. 2) Hyaluronic Acid and Aloevera Leaf ExtractThe popular ingredient for perfect hydration and major component of skin, involved in skin cell tissue repair. 3) Tea Tree Leaf Oil and Houttuynia Cordata ExtractEssential ingredient to treat skin trouble

More about the Foaming Cleanser Free from artificial ingredients; no alcohol, no animal testing, no paraben, no artificial pigment Hyaluronic acid & aloevera extract; The popular ingredient for perfect hydration and major component of skin, involved in skin cell tissue repair. Tea tree leaf oil and houttuynia cordata extract; Essential ingredient to treat skin trouble. Hypoallergenic face wash for sensitive skin A balanced foaming cleanser to keep skin level after facial wash.

Additional Information [How to use] 1) Apply some water on your face with warm water. 2) Start massaging your face with the bubble as you make a circular motion. 3) After cleanse it off with warm water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Foamy and clean feeling cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I love this foamy cleanser. I slightly wet my face and use half a pump. It does have a light scent. A little goes a long way. I gently massage it all over my face and wipe it off with a warm wet towel. It feels light, airy and gentle on my face. Strong enough to take off sweat and makeup. After washing, my face feels clean but not overly dry. Loved it so much, I’m on my second bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely cleanser that smells slightly odd
reviews.reviewText: Update: I’ve had to come back and add a star to my review because this cleanser is just so very nice. Yes, it smells a bit funny, but it cleans my face so very nicely, I forgive it everything. I’ve even bought another bottle!I love the brand Dear Klairs and I especially love their rich moist cream, so I wanted to try this cleanser. It is a very nice cleanser, I spread two pumps of the foam on my face then rinse it off, leaving my skin feeling clean and supple, but I’ve deducted one star because it smells a little odd. I know I’m being unfair because it probably smells the way it does because they’ve left out some fragrance that would irritate my sensitive skin, but it’s my review so I shall be unfair. If you have dry sensitive skin and don’t mind a mildly chemical smell in your face wash do try this, its very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves skin feeling soft and clean.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for more than 2 years and just love how my face feels after each wash super soft and cleaned. I have sensitive, oily skin and this product is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I'm giving this 4 stars for the scent. i knew others had said it was strong, but pleasant, so i thought I would take a chance as scent doesn't bother me, i am not really sensitive. BUT this is very overwhelming to me. I think it smells like my scrubbing bubbles bathroom cleaner(!). I hate the smell...but...this is very moisturizing to my skin. I am 45 with dry, aging skin and was using La Roche Posay cleanser and this one is definitly more moisturizing. I double cleanse, oil based first and then half pump of klairs. normally as soon as i pat my skin dry i can feel my skin tightening up. but with klairs i can stand around longer before my skin feels tight. Not sure i will repurchase...will need to see if the scent grows on me or not...but other than that, this is a great cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have dry sensitive skin and have been on the hunt for a new face wash because I have been using retinol lately and it’s been drying out my skin even more. I’ve been searching for a face wash that would help moisturize and not irritate my skin since it’s been peeling a bit from the retinol use. This face wash is the winner. One of the things I really like about it is that all it takes is one pump to have more than enough to wash your face. It feels very soft and silky and leaves your face feeling very soft and smooth as well. The smell is very light, but doesn’t stay on your skin, it smells like something they would use at a spa.Definitely recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product cleans and moisturizes at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin, love the light scent!
reviews.reviewText: Please keep in mind while reading this: I have terribly sensitive skin (allergies that make me break out in bad rashes on my skin, something I feel I've been fighting since I was very little with medication, skin creams, etc. etc.) and it's really hard to find products that work for me. I had been wanting to try out the Korean skin care routine because really nothing else seemed to be working, but I also wanted to keep to cruelty free products. After some research, I was able to create my own "Korean skin care routine kit for sensitive skin" and WOW, my skin feels amazing.Unfortunately, since I bought them all at the same time and started using them all right away, I can't attribute any one thing to keeping my skin feeling so soft, my pores shrinking, my rashes GONE, and the CONSTANT peeling on my nose also no longer being a problem.What I CAN say about this cleanser is that, when paired with the KLAIRS Gentle Black Deep Cleansing Oil, my face feels amazing. It has just right amount of moisture while still being clean. I could visibly see a difference with my normally huge pores after a few days of using this combination. These two steps (the cleansing oil and then foaming cleanser) are my favorite parts about my skin care routine, hands down. I would definitely recommend using this brand.In my set I bought:- KLAIRS Gentle Black Deep Cleansing Oil- KLAIRS Rich Moist Foaming Cleanser- KLAIRS Supple Preparation Facial Toner- COSRX Tone Balance Essence- KLAIRS Rich Moist Serum- INNISFREE Orchid Eye Cream- COSRX Aloe Soothing Day Cream AND COSRX Ultimate Moisturizing Honey Overnight Mask

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s not for me
reviews.reviewText: I only bought it since it has high reviews and I’ve seen this product on other sites, but it’s just a foamy cleanser with a strong smell. Did it work? Yeah, just the smell wasn’t it for me
I get complemented on my skin all the time and this is one of my holy grails! It leaves my face soft and not dry at all and cleans wonderfully. It also smells great in my opinion.

Per chi segue la skincare coreana questo detergente è ottimo come secondo step dopo la detersione a base oleosa. Si può comunque utilizzare come prodotto unico per detersione mattutina o serale. Produce una ricca schiuma dall’odore indefinito ma delicato (sa di “pulito”). Non secca la pelle ma comunque meglio utilizzare sempre un siero o un idratante come step successivo. Non do 5 stelle perché la confezione di soli 100 ml è troppo piccola e dura troppo poco!

It's a really good cleanser for face, it's gentle and doesn't give you rashes but cleans the face really well. I know it's expensive but it's worth a try for sure. I was using forest essentials cleanser (mashobra honey, lemon and rosewater), but I can see the stark difference (the other one was irritating my face, giving me small bumps and accentuating the existing ones). This cleanser reduced the accentuated bumps and made my skin smooth (which was the original state of the skin on my face). Hope everyone else will have the same experience as me 😊!
Es el segundo que compro. Perfecto y deja un frescor en la cara estupendo. Para repetir y repetir .
Reinigt sanft und gründlich, ohne die Haut auszutrocknen. Kann ich nur empfehlen
